column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is an absolute madhouse on the weekends so prepare to wait at the bar for 1-2 hours for a seat. It is well worth it though to hang in the bar despite the fact that you may crammed closer to your neighbor than on a morning red line commute. Â I've tried every flavor sangria
column2: and I love them all! There are abundant veggie tapas options here
column3: so you can go with your carnivorous friends and everyone will be satisfied. The staff are attentive and prompt. This place is great for groups
column4: not as much fun for dates. It is wonderful when summer rolls around and the 4 season room looses it's plastic.
